pages.title: Shifting Upgrade Template
pages.text: This is used to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to the "Shifting" level.$(br2) This is made from Spouting "Liquid Blue Dragon Essence" onto a "Netherite Upgrade Template".
This pickaxe is required to mine the "Shifting Crystal Ore".
Can only be mined with a "Shifting Pickaxe" or higher.
Made from compacting "Shifting Crystal Dust", "Clay Balls", and "Lava".

pages.title: Pearl Essence
pages.text: Obtained from killing the "Thermospherical Shard of the Dragon".

pages.title: Liquid Blue Essence
pages.text: Obtained from draining a "Pearl Dragon Essence" item.
Obtained from a Sequenced Assembly starting with "Charged Shifting Crystal Brick", and adding to it "Shifting Crystal", and "Liquid Blue Dragon Essence".

pages.title: Nether Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Tropospherical Nether Portal

pages.title: End Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Tropospherical End Portal

pages.title: Return Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Tropospherical Portal
